item.title: Ben Platt, Original Broadway Cast of Dear Evan Hansen - Waving Through A Window
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, F(add9), Gsus4, Am, Dm, G, F, E7
From Dear Evan Hansen
See the tutorial video (GCEA) at https://youtu.be/jPyNJ7l_T_A
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for GCEA ukulele, available at ukefarm.com. The Motion background video is from pixasbay.com (window-billlowing-curtains-drapes-1000)
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Israel Kamakawiwo'ole - What A Wonderful World (Medley)
item.description:
Performed by Israel Kamakawiwo'ole. Written by Harold Arlen & E.Y. Harburg / George David Weiss & Bob Thiele & Israel Kamakawiwo'ole
The ukulele song for me and I guess for countless others. It got me into uke playing so I wanted to make a easy-to-follow version for other Iz fans out there.
The picture is of young Iz. I don't have the info of the photographer but I hope they will not mind me using it here. Iz has gone behind the rainbow long ago but I can't help wondering if he, as a kid or even later on in his life, ever dreamed of becoming the much loved artist he grew up to be.
I wanted to make a version where you can follow either chord markings in the text of the regular ones at the bottom of the video (or both).
For strumming help, see this helpful video from the wonderful Cynthia Lin: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qqDiaZ-pqyA
Note: The rather complicated Dm7 can be played as a regular Dm as well.

item.title: Demi Lovato - Let It Go (From "Frozen / Single Version)
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G (Original Key)
As performed by Demi Lovato.
I also created a play along of “Let It Go” from the movie Frozen, but there are a few more twists and turns harmonically in that version (https://youtu.be/FyyWuj-jS1U).
There is one part of a verse in this version where a Dm and Cm are substituted for D and C...that’s kind of fun...watch for it.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Lea Salonga, Brad Kane - A Whole New World (From "Aladdin" / Soundtrack Version)
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Keys of D and F...18 chords in all! I was originally considering changing the key...but the original key is about as ukulele friendly as you are going to find, even with some expanded chords. I think these chords work better than most of the written chord charts you will find for this song on the Internet. Enjoy!
As performed in Aladdin!
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Na - Can You Feel The Love - Instrumental
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C. The original (by Elton John—not the version in the movie) is in Bb, so this version is raised a whole step. This is a great song to introduce Bb (if you know the other chords), as the chord changes are nice and slow and a single strum per beat works very well with the song.
As performed by Elton John.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Mona Mor - Let It Go
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G. Lowered one half step from the original key.
As performed by Idina Menzel in “Frozen”
The introduction to this song is tricky with some Am sus4, Am, and A chords that are not typical...however, they sounded better where written. If these are too difficult, I plan to put Demi Lovato’s version of “Let It Go” into a ukulele play along soon, and that uses less complicated chords. Once you get past the intro, chords are pretty standard, but there are some Bm and Bb chords, and a solitary C chord.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Keala Settle, The Greatest Showman Ensemble - This Is Me
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C. The original is in D, so this is lowered by a whole step. This uses four standard chords taught in most elementary ukulele methods! (Am, F, G, C)
As seen in “The Greatest Showman.” Go see it, and buy the DVD/Digital Version when it comes out!
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
